meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>clever</kanji> <kanji>person</kanji> is a <vocabulary>sage</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>wise person</vocabulary>. This word has quite an old-fashioned feel, so you'll mostly see it in old stories!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
